org.hibernate.search.cfg.impl

Class DelegatingClassLoaderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.cfg.impl.DelegatingClassLoaderService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassLoaderService, Service

    public class DelegatingClassLoaderService
extends Object
implements ClassLoaderService
    An implementation of class loader service which delegates to the ORM provided ClassLoaderService. If class, resource or service loading fails in ORM class loader, the current class loader is checked.
    Author:
    Hardy Ferentschik

      • loadJavaServices

        public <T> LinkedHashSet<T> loadJavaServices(Class<T> serviceContract)
        Description copied from interface: ClassLoaderService
        Discovers and instantiates implementations of the named service contract.

        NOTE : the terms service here is used differently than Service. Instead here we are talking about services as defined by ServiceLoader.

        Specified by:
        loadJavaServices in interface ClassLoaderService
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the service contract
        Parameters:
        serviceContract - The java type defining the service contract
        Returns:
        The ordered set of discovered services.
